lyrics:
11 contributorshot blood lyricsverse 1
you turn your back youre a broken man
you come around and just dying to shake your hand
i dont expect you to understand
just keep telling yourself theres no shame

chorus
they dont know bout who we are
they dont know bout you and i
they aint know bout the stars of your eyes
oh hot blood love is gonna get ya

verse 2
you wanna prove youre the better man
you wanna reach for the things that nobody can
oh all you need is to break away yeah
just keep telling yourself theres no shame

chorus
they dont know bout who we are
they dont know bout you and i
they aint know bout the stars of your eyes
oh hot blood love is gonna get ya

bridge
and then you get up and get up and get up again
singing get up and get up yeah nobody cares
and then you get up and get up and get up again
oh lord
yeah lord
you might also likeverse 3
never run down
youre holding your light above me now
never run down
never run down

outro
hot blood
hot blood yeah
hot blood
hot blood
and then you get up and get up and get up again
singing get up and get up yeah nobody cares
and then you get up and get up and get up again
oh lord
